The hypothesis ultrasound image use visualize brachial plexus compression distortion pectoralis muscle arm activity , abduction , normal subject demonstrate plexus compression muscle distortion .
DOC.brief_title: Thoracic Outlet Syndrome : Case Reports Analysis With Ultrasound Imaging
DOC.detailed_description: Four patient thoracic outlet syndrome ( TOS ) underwent clinical exam nerve test prove TOS nerve abnormality . They subsequently ultrasound image shoulder ( infraclavicular region ) rest arm abduction stress test . Two control subject similar clinical exam nerve test prove TOS , underwent similar ultrasound stress test . The TOS patient demonstrate brachial plexus compression pectoralis minor muscle distortion stress test , normal subject show plexus compression muscle distortion .
DOC.criteria: INCLUSION CRITERIA : Thoracic outlet patient must : symptoms consistent thoracic outlet syndrome , electrical test abnormality , positive arm abduction stress test . Normal subject must : upper limb symptom , normal nerve testing , negative arm abduction stress test EXCLUSION CRITERIA : Thoracic outlet patient exclude : nerve test abnormality , negative arm abduction stress test Normals exclude : abnormality nerve test , positive arm abduction stress test
